    Class Description
    KcopDefaultBehaviorIntegrated
    This Kcop code produces the same behavior as the default Kafka Replication code, ie.
    KcopJsonFormatIntegrated
    This KCOP replicates operations on the source to Kafka using JSON encoded Avro.
    KcopJsonSingleRowAuditFormatIntegrated
    This KCOP replicates an audit record on the source to Kafka using JSON encoded Avro.

    This sample produces audit records in CSV format.

    This sample produces an audit record in avro format.

    This sample produces an audit record in avro format.
